channel.title: Count on The Indian Engineer
channel.description: Recent content in Count on The Indian Engineer

item.title: Problem 1684 Count the Number of Consistent Strings
item.description: Problem Statement Link - Problem 1684 Question You are given a string allowed consisting of distinct characters and an array of strings words.

item.title: Problem 2220 Minimum Bit Flips to Convert Number
item.description: Problem Statement Link - Problem 2220 Question A bit flip of a number x is choosing a bit in the binary representation of x and flipping it from either 0 to 1 or 1 to 0.

item.title: Problem 3265 Count Almost Equal Pairs I
item.description: Problem Statement Link - Problem 3265 Question You are given an array nums consisting of positive integers.

item.title: Problem 128 Longest Consecutive Sequence
item.description: Problem Statement Link - Problem 128 Question Given an unsorted array of integers nums, return the length of the longest consecutive elements sequence.
